Detailed Description

cvmx_sriomaint::_tx_drop

This register controls and provides status for dropping outgoing SRIO packets. The DROP bit should only be cleared when no packets are currently being dropped. This can be guaranteed by clearing SRIOMAINT()_PORT_0_CTL[O_ENABLE] before changing the DROP bit and restoring the O_ENABLE afterwards.
